newsitem.title: JAPAN: NTT Data, Nihon Sun Microsystems tie up on Java.
newsitem.headline: NTT Data, Nihon Sun Microsystems tie up on Java.

text.p: NTT Data Communications Systems said on Monday that it had agreed with Nihon Sun Microsystems KK on a technological tie-up in developing new applications of Java, a computer programming language.
Under the tie-up, NTT Data, a unit of Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp, will be able to develop computer systems based on Java, a company spokesman said.
NTT Data sees business opportunities in such area as electronic commerce for computer systems based on the platform-independent computer language.
Nihon Sun Microsystems is a subsidiary of Sun Microsystems Inc of the United States.
